Michael Vick 's got it all at this point,'' Eagles offensive coordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that.
